TextLibrary.Text: Tauron Flamebite
What do I have to do in order to enter your temple and talk with you?
What do I have to do in order to enter your temple and talk with you?
What do I have to do in order to enter your temple and talk with you?
What do I have to do in order to enter your temple and talk with you?
You are persistent, outsider. If you wish to enter the Horned Temple, you must undergo the same ritual that young Minotaurs undertake to become an initiate.
You are persistent, outsider. If you wish to enter the Horned Temple, you must undergo the same ritual that young Minotaurs undertake to become an initiate.
You are persistent, outsider. If you wish to enter the Horned Temple, you must undergo the same ritual that young Minotaurs undertake to become an initiate.
You are persistent, outsider. If you wish to enter the Horned Temple, you must undergo the same ritual that young Minotaurs undertake to become an initiate.
What ritual?
What ritual?
What ritual?
What ritual?
Travel up the path northeast of here into the mountains until you see the great Volcano. Then you must climb to the top, descend into the crater, and face one of the Fire Elementals.
Travel up the path northeast of here into the mountains until you see the great Volcano. Then you must climb to the top, descend into the crater, and face one of the Fire Elementals.
Travel up the path northeast of here into the mountains until you see the great Volcano. Then you must climb to the top, descend into the crater, and face one of the Fire Elementals.
Travel up the path northeast of here into the mountains until you see the great Volcano. Then you must climb to the top, descend into the crater, and face one of the Fire Elementals.
I'll be back soon.
I'll be back soon.
I'll be back soon.
I'll be back soon.
